title: Pollination is not a negative externality

content.question: All of the following are negative externalities EXCEPT

choices.label: illnesses related to living near a manufacturing facility
noise associated with living near a major airport
air pollution caused by refinery emissions
bees pollinating vegetables in addition to creating honey
damage to crops from automobile exhaust

content.answer: bees pollinating vegetables in addition to creating honey

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe environmental concepts and processes.
